name: SWING AWAY!
description:
Swing Away! is a Baseball card game that plays with 2 players of any age. There are ability cards for both the defensive and offensive team. Along with super cards that twist the game of baseball. The goal of the game is to have the most number of runs at the end of the game. Game pieces were made in pixel art and the cards take inspiration from older baseball trading cards. It's a blast from the past and an attempt to introduce baseball to others. 

playingcards.io link: https://playingcards.io/az8cke
